external_references.description: Yonathan Klijnsma. (2016, May 17). Mofang: A politically motivated information stealing adversary. Retrieved May 12, 2020.

objects.description: [Mofang](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0103) has compressed the [ShimRat](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0444) executable within malicious email attachments. [Mofang](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0103) has also encrypted payloads before they are downloaded to victims.(Citation: FOX-IT May 2016 Mofang)
